main.name: Shohedul
main.bio: My name is Shohedul, I'm a Full Stack web application Developer. Currently I'm learning state.I have a intermediate experience in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,wordpress customization, node.js React, express.js, MongoDB, git and also know Project Management Tool jira and Agile software development.I am a person who has a remarkable proven ability to work under pressure, to plan and prioritize work. I am a capable and adaptable person who is looking forward to learn new working skills and methods in order to gain experience that can be used in a career in the near and distant future.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details anything else.
